author: Ronan Collins
description: Not just a Collins made with Irish whiskey but a Ronan Collins. There's some Irish logic as to why this cocktail is garnished with a pineapple wedge but that's what sets it apart.
name: Ronan Collins
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
